title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: A Detailed Report on the Recent Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Launch sites, observation posts, and military buildings where terrorists were stationed; IDF attacked Hezbollah terrorist organization targets in southern Lebanon.

A short while ago, fighter jets attacked several military buildings of the Hezbollah terrorist organization where terrorists were stationed in the areas of Mis al-Jabal and Blayda in southern Lebanon.

In recent hours, fighter jets attacked additional launch sites of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the area of ​​Markaba, as well as the organization’s observation post in the region of Kfar Kila in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, there were several launches from southern Lebanon that reached the areas of Har Dov and Arab al-Aramshe, the air defense soldiers intercepted some of them.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3IZSalV
